garage.Description: A dank garage, with a leaky pipe in the corner. It is filled to the brim with electronics. Is this really safe?

patio.Description: A patio overlooking a city of glittering lights. There's a small workbench setup, covered in a thin layer of circuit boards and faux feathers.

kitchen.Description: A kitchen consisting entirely of a sink and a microwave. Someone really likes ramen.
